name: mail-manager
title: Mail Manager
description: Helps to manager Apple Mail folders and messages
author: nick_kadutskyi

commands.name: index
commands.title: Move Selected Emails To Mailbox
commands.subtitle: Apple Mail
commands.description: Lists available folders to move selected emails to

commands.name: goto
commands.title: Go To Mailbox
commands.subtitle: Apple Mail
commands.description: Lists available folders to go to
